alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 5:18PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Kit Carson County through 600 PM MDT... At 517 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles east of Genoa, or 15 miles east of Limon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Flagler. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 390 and 406. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
